data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heads, Sam W., Taylor, Steven J. (2012): A new species of Ripipteryx from Belize with a key to the species of the Scrofulosa Group (Orthoptera, Ripipterygidae). ZooKeys 169: 1-9, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.169.2531, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.169.2531
